snippet: A seasoned crisis-response operative, Ron Klain, is charged with managing the federal efforts to contain the deadly virus.
abstract: Ron Klain, named by Pres Obama to be administration’s Ebola response coordinator, will have to put his knack for anticipating worst-case scenarios to work on what has rapidly become not just a potential public health crisis but a political one for the White House; Klain is seasoned crisis-response operative and veteran of Democratic administrations and campaigns.
lead_paragraph: A seasoned crisis-response operative, Ron Klain, is charged with managing the federal efforts to contain the deadly virus.

headline.main: Before Ebola, New Czar Handled Political Crises
headline.print_headline: Before Ebola, New Czar Handled Political Crises
